Description:
Some careers shine brighter than others.If you’re looking for a career that will help you stand out, join HSBC and fulfil your potential. Whether you want a career that could take you to the top, or simply take you in an exciting new direction, HSBC offers opportunities, support and rewards that will take you further.HSBC is one of the largest banking and financial services organisations in the world, with operations in 64 countries and territories. We aim to be where the growth is, enabling businesses to thrive and economies to prosper, and, ultimately, helping people to fulfil their hopes and realise their ambitions.We are currently seeking an experienced professional to join our team in the role of Consultant Specialist.In this role, you will:Develop Looker dashboards, Look-ML Code, Code management in github, code deployment

Fulfil operational and strategic reporting & data visualistion needs across the organization.

Create and manage the logic in the singular, semantic reporting layer so definitions of KPIs are applied consistently.

Fulfil the operational data needs for customer marketing and service messaging. Validate strategic business hypotheses by transforming data as required

Understand how to analyse and create actionable recommendations from mobile app customer journey data; eg drop-off rates in on-boarding journeys.

Construct and execute hypothesis tests using the data on our analytical environment in Looker, SQL adashboards.

Understand, at a high level, the business objective and have this drive the work. Create an elegant, polished data visualisation, suitable for the executive level. 

Craft the compelling written and spoken narrative to drive action: “Make them think what we think”. Experienceamiliarity working with data engineering teams and ETL. Job Details
